mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sub_pitches(name, is_active, pitch_id, create_at, update_at, pitch_type_id) VALUES (#{name},#{isActive}, #{pitchId},#{createAt}, #{updateAt}, #{pitchTypeId})
mapper.select: SELECT sp.id, sp.name, sp.create_at AS createAt, sp.update_at AS updateAt, sp.pitch_type_id AS pitchTypeId, sp.is_active AS isActive, pt.name AS pitchType FROM sub_pitches sp LEFT JOIN pitch_types pt ON pt.id = sp.pitch_type_id WHERE pitch_id = #{pitchId}

SELECT sp.id, sp.name, sp.create_at AS createAt, sp.update_at AS updateAt, sp.pitch_type_id AS pitchTypeId, sp.is_active AS isActive, sp.pitch_id AS pitchId, pt.name AS pitchType FROM sub_pitches sp LEFT JOIN pitch_types pt ON pt.id = sp.pitch_type_id WHERE sp.id = #{id}
